title: Free refunds for accidents
body:
Hey guys, today when I wanted to buy zyra I was half asleep, and for some reason I accidentally purchased Fiora, whom I will never touch until she is nerfed. The thing is, I have not used Fiora a single time yet, but to refund her I still need to use a refund token. Therefore, I request that there is a free refund if you accidentally purchased a wrong champion, skin or rune, but did not use it a single time. Seems rather logical to me tbh.
Have a nice day {{champion:35}}

replies.body: How did you confuse zyra with fiora? What the %%%%?

Fiora doesn't need nerfing, she is just strong against a lot of the current top lane picks.

Besides she is already in the run for a rework, last I read on the matter Riot want to turn her into a dedicated jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wXvbAKof,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-09T02:49:31.578+0000)
>
> Fiora doesn't need nerfing, she is just strong against a lot of the current top lane picks.
> 
> Besides she is already in the run for a rework, last I read on the matter Riot want to turn her into a dedicated jungler.

Well then plz explain to me how come talon got nerfed simply because he stood out sinc everyone else got nerfed

Talon didn't get nerfed, he has his silence removed. Something that no assassin should have, and now doesn't.
How did he get nerfed for standing out?

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wXvbAKof,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T05:22:18.883+0000)
>
> Talon didn't get nerfed, he has his silence removed. Something that no assassin should have, and now doesn't.
> How did he get nerfed for standing out?

Silence is the whole point of assassins, where you go behind them and say 'shhh', kill them and finish off with a 'just sleep'. Now I go onto someone and they immediately zhonya's while I just stand there looking stupid. As a matter of fact assassins used to have the most silence in the game, tied perhaps with mages.

Yeah they did, and everyone complained about them. Especially since most assassins would blink on to you silence you for three times the length of Morgana's bind and while you're silenced they'd just destroy you.

THEY HAD NO PRACTICAL COUNTER PLAY.

But you remove the silence from assassins and now they have counter play, instead of being a literal "smash head into keyboard to win".

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wXvbAKof,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-10T03:59:49.744+0000)
> silence you for three times the length of Morgana's bind

u wot m8?
Talon had a 1 second silence ._.

One second of silence from an assassin, is worse than a three second bind on a mage.


The big problem with assassins was that they had silences. They jump on you, silence you and you have no way to try and stop them instantly blowing you up, you can't {{item:3157}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:21}} {{item:3140}} . At least if you're stunned or rooted you can do these things.

Hell Talon still instant shots you if you don't do some of these, he still needs major nerfing like Zed got.
loss of silence=nerf, even if he was OP with the silence

You know they have a confirmation pop-up, so in order to purchase a champ you need to click on like 2-3 different things, all of which let you know which champion you are about to purchase. Even half asleep you should be able to pick the right thing, I have no idea how you got Zyra and Fiora mixed up... And ultimately if Riot were going to give you a refund without using a refund token then you'd need to contact support about it, though they'd probably mention about the confirmation pop-up and not give you a refund.

tldr It's your own fault, Riot isn't responsible for your choice.
Contact support and try your luck.

Yeah, I know. I just thought about support now though. Even if they would consider refunding you though, it has been ten days so it seems a lot more unlikely.
Just play Fiora jungle like wowo
nope, you made a mistake, you have to accept the consequences.

Also since ppl seem to be reading me wrong, I personally don't care that I got a champ I didn't want since I already have more than enough to play with for now, but I simply propose a system that wouldn't do much harm and seems logical to me. Didn't think people would be so angry about it O_o
